summary: WHEN FILLING GAS THE GAS POURS OUT OF THE FILL PIPE BEFOR IT HAS SHUT OFF THE PUMP.  THIS HAS HAPPENED AT MOST PUMPS THAT I HAVE VISITED.    THERE IS NO WAY TO TELL YOUR ARE NEAR THE TOP OF THE TANK.  THE GAS JUST SPILLS OUT FOR A FEW SECONDS.  COULD CAUSE FIRES, ENVIROMENTAL DAMAGE AND DAMAGE TO PAINT ON CARS.
